descriptionNodes.text:
###### Cleaning the lint filter

The lint filter should be cleaned regularly to prevent the development of bacteria and bad smells.

###### Clean rubber seals

The rubber seals near the door of the washing machine can accumulate dirt and bacteria. It can be cleaned with a cloth with diluted citric acid.

I would only use citric acid if I wash afterward because I am not sure whether it could damage the rubber otherwise in the long term.
What maintenance tasks should owners of washing machines keep in mind?
